channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Dream Factory
channel.description: in this episode of Fear, @Coalhada and I talk about the classic Call of Cthulhu mystery, Dream Factory. The Expert Delve is about emergent horror. This is a classic Fear of a Black Dragon episode, great topic, great listen. Check it out: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/february-14th-2021
